item.description:
This concert is part of a series during Yankee Homecoming week in Newburyport. These concerts are FREE and very well-attended. Please bring a chair or blanket for seating. This is a shared event with other meetup groups.

MUSIC: begins at 7:30

WE WILL MEETUP:  in front of The Firehouse Center For The Arts - by the bench with the shadey tree. I'll have either a meetup.com sign or wear my meetup pin.... I will add and send out my contact # the day before.  *** Parking can be tight -especially during Yankee Homecoming. So, please make sure to allow for that timewise.....

 

**This is an all-outdoor event. RAIN CANCELS. I will update depending on weather condition.

Music begins @ 7:30

 

MORE TO FOLLOW............
item.how_to_find_us: we will all meetup outside The Firehouse center at the bench - Please read event details for more info
item.name: Concert Series @ WaterFront Park - JAMES MONTGOMERY
